about_the_game:
Experience the Pacific and Atlantic Wonders Cruise

As Cruise Director in charge, enjoy a truly sensational Cruise of a Lifetime aboard the super luxurious, USS Liberty of the Waves.

Arrange fabulous excursions in Alaska, the Bahamas, on African Safari etc. Visit famous tourist Sights and Landmarks. Enjoy Pacific and Atlantic highlights, be on the First cruise ship Ever to sail the North West Passage, transit the Panama Canal. Help passengers with Cabins, Shopping, Dining, Leisure on ship and at Ports of Call along the way.

Collect Souvenirs of the cruise. Look for hundreds of hidden objects, items Lost by Passengers, Trash for Recycling. Play superb Mini-Games. earn Merit Badges for your Achievements. Vacation Adventures : Cruise Director 3 guarantees truly captivating, hour upon hour gameplay for Families and All ages to enjoy.

Find objects in beautiful Hidden Object Scenes along with a wide range of puzzle games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 600Mhz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 7.0a
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
